verses.verse: Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, (for he was the firstborn <S%H1060><s%>; but <S%H2490><s%>, forasmuch as he defiled his father <S%H1><s%>'s bed <S%H3326><s%>, his birthright <S%H1062><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and the genealogy is not to be reckoned <S%H3187><s%> after the birthright <S%H1062><s%>.
For Judah <S%H3063><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> above his brothers <S%H251><s%>, and of him came the chief ruler <S%H5057><s%>; but the birthright <S%H1062><s%> was Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s:)

The sons <S%H1121><s%>, I say <S%H7205><s%>, of Reuben the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were <S%H2585><s%>, Hanoch, and Pallu <S%H6396><s%>, Hezron <S%H2696><s%>, and Carmi <S%H3756><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joel <S%H3100><s%>; Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Gog <S%H1463><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Shimei <S%H8096><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,
Micah <S%H4318><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Reaia <S%H7211><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Baal <S%H1168><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,

Beerah <S%H880><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, whom Tilgath <S%H8407><s%>–pilneser king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> carried away <S%H1540><s%> captive <S%H5387><s%>: he was prince of the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>.

And his brothers <S%H251><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>, when the genealogy <S%H3187><s%> of their generations <S%H8435><s%> was reckoned <S%H3187><s%>, were the chief <S%H7218><s%>, Jeiel <S%H3273><s%>, and Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>,

And Bela <S%H1106><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azaz <S%H5811><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shema <S%H8087><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joel <S%H3100><s%>, who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, even unto Nebo <S%H5015><s%> and Baal <S%H1186><s%>–meon:

And eastward <S%H4217><s%> he inhabited <S%H3427><s%> unto the entering <S%H935><s%> in of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> from the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates <S%H6578><s%>: because their cattle <S%H4735><s%> were multiplied <S%H7235><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>.

And in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> they made <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with the Hagarites <S%H1905><s%>, who fell <S%H5307><s%> by their hand <S%H3027><s%>: and they lived <S%H3427><s%> in their tents <S%H168><s%> throughout <S%H6440><s%> all the east <S%H4217><s%> land of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> over against them <S%H776><s%>, in the land of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> unto Salchah <S%H5548><s%>:
Joel <S%H3100><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%>, and Shapham <S%H8223><s%> the next <S%H4932><s%>, and Jaanai <S%H3285><s%>, and Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>.

And their brothers <S%H251><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> were <S%H4317><s%>, Michael, and Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>, and Sheba <S%H7652><s%>, and Jorai <S%H3140><s%>, and Jachan <S%H3275><s%>, and Zia <S%H2127><s%>, and Heber <S%H5677><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%>.

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Abihail <S%H32><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Huri <S%H2359><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jaroah <S%H3386><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael <S%H4317><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshishai <S%H3454><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jahdo <S%H3163><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Buz <S%H938><s%>;
Ahi <S%H277><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abdiel <S%H5661><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Guni <S%H1476><s%>, chief <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And they lived <S%H3427><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, and in her towns <S%H1323><s%>, and in all the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of Sharon <S%H8289><s%>, upon their borders <S%H8444><s%>.

All these were reckoned by genealogies <S%H3187><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jotham <S%H3147><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, of valiant men <S%H2428><s%>, men <S%H582><s%> able to carry <S%H5375><s%> shield <S%H4043><s%> and sword <S%H2719><s%>, and to shoot <S%H1869><s%> with bow <S%H7198><s%>, and skillful <S%H3925><s%> in war <S%H4421><s%>, were four <S%H702><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and sixty <S%H8346><s%>, that went out <S%H3318><s%> to the war <S%H6635><s%>.
And they made <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with the Hagarites <S%H1905><s%>, with Jetur <S%H3195><s%>, and Nephish <S%H5305><s%>, and Nodab <S%H5114><s%>.

And they were helped <S%H5826><s%> against them <S%H1905><s%>, and the Hagarites were delivered <S%H5414><s%> into their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and all that were with them <S%H2199><s%>: for they cried to God <S%H430><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>, and he was entreated <S%H6279><s%> of them <S%H982><s%>; because they put their trust in him.

And they took away <S%H7617><s%> their cattle <S%H4735><s%>; of their camels <S%H1581><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, and of sheep <S%H6629><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, and of donkeys <S%H2543><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%>, and of men <S%H120><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

For there fell <S%H5307><s%> down many <S%H7227><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%>, because the war <S%H4421><s%> was of God <S%H430><s%>. And they lived <S%H3427><s%> in their places until the captivity <S%H1473><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>: they increased <S%H7235><s%> from Bashan <S%H1316><s%> unto Baal <S%H1179><s%>–hermon and Senir <S%H8149><s%>, and unto mountain <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%>.

And these were the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, even Epher <S%H6081><s%>, and Ishi <S%H3469><s%>, and Eliel <S%H447><s%>, and Azriel <S%H5837><s%>, and Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, and Hodaviah <S%H1938><s%>, and Jahdiel <S%H3164><s%>, mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%>, famous <S%H8034><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and heads <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And they transgressed <S%H4603><s%> against the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, and went a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, whom God <S%H430><s%> destroyed <S%H8045><s%> before them <S%H6440><s%>.

And the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stirred up <S%H5782><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Pul <S%H6322><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%>, and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Tilgath <S%H8407><s%>–pilneser king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%>, and he carried them away <S%H1540><s%>, even the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>, and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> them unto Halah <S%H2477><s%>, and Habor <S%H2249><s%>, and Hara <S%H2024><s%>, and to the river <S%H5104><s%> Gozan <S%H1470><s%>, unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.
